movie.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movie.plot: Jack Sparrow, a freewheeling 18th-century pirate, quarrels with a rival pirate bent on pillaging Port Royal. When the governor's daughter is kidnapped, Sparrow decides to help the girl's love save her.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 38 wins & 98 nominations.
